titleStmt.title: The contrition of a Protestant preacher, converted to be a Catholiqve scholler conteyning certayne meditations vpon the fourth penitentiall psalme, Miserere / composed by Iames Waddesworth, Bachlour of Diuinitie in the Vniversity of Cambridge, & late parson of Cotton, and of Great-Thorneham in the County of Suffolke, who went into Spaine with the Kinges Maiesties first Embassadour-Legier, as his chaplayne ...
titleStmt.author: Wadsworth, James, 1572?-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted with licence, at S. Omers, by Charles Boscard, at the signe of the Name of Iesvs,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Name of Iesvs
